content.rendered:
Stay at our boutique hotel near Buckingham Palace

Individually designed havens

Rooms that have everything you want, plus a little bit more. Beds that you sink into, bespoke toiletries, and a personal bar stocked with more than just those run-of-the-mill options. And with unique designs and details in every room, no two stays are ever alike. We pride ourselves on being there exactly when you need us. No task is too big, or too small. Our friendly team are on hand 24 hours a day to ensure you have everything you need to enjoy your stay.

Explore Rooms Explore Facilities

Book i

What our guests say

This hotel is fabulous, we were checked in with a glass of bubbly while our bags were taken to the room. The location is great and the staff very attentive.

Ian, Booking.com 

“We loved the hotel, very modern and comfortable room and exceptionally nice reception staff. We were offered complimentary drinks on arrival which was a lovely touch. We were also surprised with a birthday cake for my husband’s birthday.”

Urszula, Booking.com

“Exceptional staff made this an amazing break. The property is in a great location. The room was spacious and comfortable. Everything was spotlessly clean. Check-in and check-out was professional and efficient. Highly recommended for a break in London.”

Happytranswritter, Tripadvisor 

The location of the hotel is lovely, tucked away in a smart quiet road which is a super quick and easy walk to Buckingham Palace and multiple tube stations. I would definitely recommend this hotel and will be back myself on my next trip to London

Vicki, Tripadvisor

Had a truly amazing experience here with my girlfriend. The staff were so friendly and were always happy to help with anything! The room we stayed in was just perfect too. The level of service was exactly what you’d expect from a hotel like this. We will be back!

Grant McLean, Google

Incredible stay at this hotel with myself and my partner. Very clean and comfortable in a superb location. Highly recommend staying again.

Daniel Harley, Google

Absolutely blown away by the personal service. A very special 5* boutique hotel that is extremely good value for money!

Duane Paterson, Google

Very comfortable, cosy, beautifully appointed boutique hotel and excellent customer service. Lots of nice little finishing touches in room, great shower, coffee, toiletries very good breakfast options. Would certainly come again and recommend to others.

Deborah Harrison, TripAdvisor

The hotel staff were outstanding. From check in to departure they couldn’t do enough to help. It was a great hotel to come back to after a long day shopping and sightseeing. Very peaceful and a good place to unwind. We’ll definitely be back.

Rm77_11, Tripadvisor

FACILITIES

What's in your room

  • In-room amenities
  • HD TV with 150 national and international channels with Chromecast
  • 24-hour concierge and room service
  • Underfloor heating in en-suite
  • Personal bar stocked with fair-trade and locally sourced items
  • Nespresso coffee machine
  • Under bed luggage storage

Service like no other

Need a hand? Our specialist concierge team is on hand to make your stay at The Guardsman Hotel truly unique.

For further information on our concierge please call +44207 309 9200

OUR RESIDENCES

City living, redefined.

Our address is one of the most sought-after locations in London. An address that could be yours in one of our six self-contained, beautifully appointed residences.

View Residences
